original_title: 家出少女とオジサンの小さな恋の物語 永野いち夏
overview: The girl was looking for a place to stay. Uncle was looking for "something" that she wanted to protect. The two of them meet by chance. Her playful and cheerful girl hides her weakness... The old man who pushes her girl away is to hide her pure love for a girl much older than her... Such two people lick each other's wounds and grow up...
title: Small Love Story Between Runaway Girl And Older Man Ichika Nagano
